attributes.action: To dissolve parliament with immediate effect and let the people vote on the moral integrity of our MPs and political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the past weeks we have seen some of or elected members seemingly enrich themselves at the taxpayer’s expense. Instead of pointing to the flaws of a lack expenses system they have instead milked it for every penny. It is now time to give the public the opportunity to remove those MPs who have acted without morals and integrity and show our support for the MPs that have refused to partake it this legalised plunder of the public purse. Please sign this petition and use it as an opportunity to remind our MPs who they answer to and what we expect of them as our elected representatives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
